channel.title: textbox on Delven Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in textbox on Delven Documentation

item.title: Buttons
item.description: Interacting with Buttons Parameter Specification Name Spec Data Types Description value required [String] Set value event required [String] Invoke event "event[1]" : "click" ] Example <button type="button" id="btn">Click Me!</button> Setting Value SELECT css("#btn") FROM http://www.delven.io/test/execute.html EVENTFLOW [ { "by-css": "#btn", "value": "New Button Name" } ] { "column_1" : {"value" : "New Button Name"} } Invoking Click Event Following example will select our button and then perform an click action.

item.title: Textbox
item.description: Interacting with Texboxes Parameter Specification Name Spec Data Types Description value optional [String] Set value Example <input type="text" id="firstname" value=""> Setting Values Setting single value SELECT css("#firstname") FROM http://www.delven.io/test/execute.html EVENTFLOW [ { "by-css": "#firstname", "value": "Greg" } ] { "column_1" : {"value" : "Greg"} } Setting multiple values SELECT css("#firstname") as first , css("#lastname") as last FROM http://www.delven.io/test/execute.html EVENTFLOW [ { "by-css": "#firstname", "value": "Greg" }, { "by-css": "#lastname", "value": "B.
